## Applies To ##
* Ruby
## Problem Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env ruby require 'mysql2'
if ARGV.length == 0 puts "Usage: #{$0} [username]" exit end
client = Mysql2::Client.new(:host => "localhost", :username => "root", :database => 'application') username = ARGV[0] query = "SELECT id,username FROM users WHERE username='#{username}'" results = client.query(query)
if results.count == 0 puts "Username not found." else results.each do |row| puts "Username: #{row['username']}" puts "ID: #{row['id']}" end end ~~~~
## Solution Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env ruby require 'mysql2'
if ARGV.length == 0 puts "Usage: #{$0} [username]" exit end
client = Mysql2::Client.new(:host => "server", :username => "user", :password => 'password', :database => 'dbname') username = ARGV[0] query = client.prepare("SELECT id,username FROM users WHERE username=?") results = query.execute(username)
if results.count == 0 puts "Username not found." else results.each do |row| puts "Username: #{row['username']}" puts "ID: #{row['id']}" end end ~~~~
